website_summaries.verdict: Easy to slip on, this style offers a head-turning alternative to the fisherman's sandal design.
pros: Comes in black full grain leather, brown distressed and cymball full grain leather
Leather and fabric lining, cushioned footbed,  rubber outsole
cons: No strap on back of shoe to hold it onto foot

customer_reviews.title: The highest quality at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: More design than any other - the padding front and back breathe and support. The leather quality is beautiful. This is my 3rd pair (dog destroyed the 1st which lasted 5 years before meeting their premature demise). Straightaway, bought a brown and a black pair after looking at Mephisto's. The price for the quality and fit is amazing and I'm not going to shell out $400+ for lower featured sandals.
customer_reviews.author: David Bishop

customer_reviews.title: my size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a narrow width you sent med.width,there was no narrow width choice,if I could have that choice,I would gladly buy them again,I've been wearing this shoe for many years,sadley I can't get narrow width,very disipointed,help me get what I need,help
customer_reviews.author: eloise prather

customer_reviews.title: ... as it's not as clean a look as I like. But they are pretty cushy and looking forward ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have a seam up the middle that isn't as prominent in the website photo so that was a bit disappointing as it's not as clean a look as I like. But they are pretty cushy and looking forward to wearing them in europe.
customer_reviews.author: Walla Walla customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love my Born Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got my first pair for $25 at a factory outlet store and now I am hooked. My old pair wore out, but my awesome wife bought me another pair...True Love...and the shoes are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Sven J Svenson

customer_reviews.title: Even better than before
customer_reviews.text: This pair is improved over the last pair I owned for over 4 years. Solid construction with even better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: tedd

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. They fit as expected and love the comfort soles
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nelson

customer_reviews.title: ... Born sandal for about 10 years and they were great! My new pair is turning out the same
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Born sandal for about 10 years and they were great! My new pair is turning out the same. Quality throughout
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bussard

customer_reviews.title: They are very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of the same sandals that I have owned and I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed! ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but comfortable sandals. Look good with jeans or shorts. I ordered in both brown and black.
customer_reviews.author: Jbro1220

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sandals look good and are very comfortable. If they only came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but saws toes and looks like the wrong material for sandal soles.
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these barefoot, they cut into the top of toes like a dull saw. I'm afraid to wear these barefoot and ruin the sole. They look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

product_meta.title: BORN - Mens - Jared
product_meta.description: A warm-weather slide thoughtfully designed with a durable outsole.
